LanguageData.SewageSludgeComposting.label: компостування
LanguageData.SewageSludgeComposting.description: When properly treated and processed, sewage sludge becomes biosolids that offer a small boost to terrain fertility. Useful for harsh environments with limited space to grow. Biosolids also produce a large boost to the fertility of sand which can make it fertile when combined with irrigation.
LanguageData.MultiSplitAirCon.label: розширене кондиціонування
LanguageData.MultiSplitAirCon.description: Build multi-split air conditioning systems with outdoor units piped to indoor units and freezers.
LanguageData.Plumbing.label: трубопровід
LanguageData.Plumbing.description: Use pipes, plumbing fixtures, storage tanks, wind pumps and other apparatuses to deliver and drain water and sewage.
LanguageData.LogBoilers.label: опалення
LanguageData.LogBoilers.description: Build log boilers which can be used to heat rooms and can be placed adjacent to baths to heat bathwater.
LanguageData.CentralHeating.label: центральне опалення
LanguageData.CentralHeating.description: Build central heating systems with radiators, hot water tanks, boilers and thermostats.
LanguageData.GeothermalHeating.label: геотермальне опалення
LanguageData.GeothermalHeating.description: Build geothermal heaters which can be built over geysers to generate heat for central heating and hot water tanks.
LanguageData.Saunas.label: сауна
LanguageData.Saunas.description: Build a dedicated room with a sauna heater where colonists can relax and clean, frequent use can reduce the chance of heart attacks.
LanguageData.ModernFixtures.label: сучасна сантехніка
LanguageData.ModernFixtures.description: Build modern-style bathroom fixtures like toilets and showers.
LanguageData.ElectricPumps.label: електричні труби
LanguageData.ElectricPumps.description: Powered water pumps for pressurized continuous water pumping.
LanguageData.AdvancedShowers.label: power showers
LanguageData.AdvancedShowers.description: Build power showers which halve the time spent showering and improve comfort.
LanguageData.AdvancedToilets.label: розумний унітаз
LanguageData.AdvancedToilets.description: Build comfortable, self cleaning, super efficient smart toilets.
LanguageData.HotTubs.label: гаряча ванна
LanguageData.HotTubs.description: Build hot tubs which can be used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, and pleasure.
LanguageData.LargeWaterPumps.label: індустріальні труби
LanguageData.LargeWaterPumps.description: Build industrial-scale water pumps and storage tanks.
LanguageData.DeepWells.label: глибоки
LanguageData.DeepWells.description: Drill deeper wells to access a much larger area of ground water.
LanguageData.WashingMachines.label: washing machines
LanguageData.WashingMachines.description: Build washing machines that can wash clothes so well that you couldn't even tell someone died wearing it!
LanguageData.WaterFiltration.label: water filtration
LanguageData.WaterFiltration.description: Build water filtration systems which treat the water supply, eliminating the risk of disease.
LanguageData.HygieneBionics.label: Hygiene Bionics
LanguageData.HygieneBionics.description: Craft bionics that help to process bodily waste and manage personal hygiene.
LanguageData.SepticTanks.label: septic tanks
LanguageData.SepticTanks.description: Build septic tanks which accumulate sewage and provide moderate treatment of sewage.
LanguageData.SewageTreatment.label: sewage treatment
LanguageData.SewageTreatment.description: Build large sewage treatment systems which accumulate large amounts of sewage and provide fast treatment of sewage.
LanguageData.SwimmingPools.label: swimming pools
LanguageData.Irrigation.label: irrigation
LanguageData.Irrigation.description: Build sprinklers that can irrigate soil to improve fertility.
LanguageData.FireSuppression.label: fire suppression
LanguageData.FireSuppression.description: Build sprinklers that suppress fires with a spray of water.
